Title: Impact of Transceiver Subsystems on Digital Back Propagation Performance
Source: Annu. Conf. IEEE Photonics Soc., IPC
Abstract: © 2018 IEEE.The potential, limitations and practicalities of digital back propagation is investigated in the presence of noise arising from amplifier spontaneous emission noise a well as from a non-ideal transceiver subsystem.
SubjectAreas: Atomic and Molecular Physics, and Optics
